reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute with a bow detail in the back, and appreciate its perfect fit that lands above the knees. The material and fabric receive positive feedback, with one customer noting it feels like cotton/linen, and they find it comfortable and flattering. While some it's true to size, others report sizing issues, particularly with the arms being too small. Customers disagree on whether the dress is see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty!
items.body: Buy this dress if you want compliments! True to size and great quality fabric! I wore this with some cute pattern heels. It is very comfortable and fits a pair of biker shorts under it very easily. Not too short! Read more
items.author: Aaron burch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress
items.body: Get so many compliments on this dress every time I wear it! True to size and fabric is soft. It does wrinkle and had to be ironed after washing. The back cinches your waist nicely lol. I am 5'4 and the length hit just above the knees. I got the green for September into fall and will be purchasing the black because it is a classic dress. Read more
items.author: Erin McManus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sized down, cute, great value
items.body: Needed a black, knee-length dress for my daughter’s choir concert. I sized down for her. She’s 140 lbs and 5’6, normally wears a small top. I went with the XS. Fits perfect! Read more
items.author: MSully

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute!
items.body: Super cute and it’s a good length! The material is good not super soft but still comfortable! Read more
items.author: Adyson walls

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product
items.body: Pretty color, looks much better in the picture. I bought it for a wedding and it is just VERY plain. Fit was True to Size. Color was exactly as pictured. Material good. The ONLY downfall was how plain it is. Read more
items.author: Cara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Flattering Dress
items.body: I am 5’7” and 135 lbs, I ordered a size medium in black. I got this dress for a rehearsal dinner as a guest, and it ended up being perfect! It’s the perfect length, and lands right above the knee, so no worrying about it riding up when sitting or moving around. The back of the dress isn’t really revealing or low cut, and the little tie bow adds an extra touch! The cut and shape of the dress is surprisingly super flattering and feminine, and I loved it. The only note I have is the waist was a little loose for a medium, and I could’ve sized down, but I still think it looks flattering, and would especially be okay if you had a bigger bust. The zipper is on the side which I love because it is hidden. I ordered the dress in black, and it was not see through in my opinion. The fabric felt like cotton/linen and was comfortable, lightweight, flowy, but still held its shape. For the price I think it’s a great quality! I got compliments on it all night! Read more
items.author: Ava

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress and good quality as well. My daughter is taller, and this dress has a nice length to it as well. It is simple enough to wear casually or be dressed up for a more formal event like church or a funeral. Read more
items.author: Jabrummett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size
items.body: Love this dress. It wasn’t see through and I wore it all night at Megan Moroney. It’s thick and very wearable. I also appreciate the length and fit. Read more
items.author: Lila bennett

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A White, Maroon, Steel Blue, A Black, Burgundy, Olive Green, Sage Green, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Red, Baby Blue, Yellow, Light Cyan, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
